Reviews.Title: “"Best Hotel With Good Service"”
Reviews.Author: kim d
Reviews.Content: This was honestly the best hotel we have probably ever stayed at as an overall package. First of all, they let us check in much earlier than our check-in time which was extremely helpful for our itinerary. The staff there was the most friendly and hospitable team of people I have ever encountered in a hotel environment. They genuinely seemed happy to […] have us as guests. The rooms themselves were extremely spacious and accomodating. They had a refrigerator which was great since we had brought snacks. The beds and linens were extremely comfortable and the bathroom ammenities were outstanding. Every time we ran into someone they seemed super happy to help us. The complimentary breakfast was incredibly ample and was much more than muffins and juice. They had waffles, variety of breads and fruits. Cereal, juices, coffee, etc.The internet speed is so fast. It was amazing!

Reviews.Title: “"Very nice and comfortable"”
Reviews.Author: ross5995
Reviews.Content: We were only here for a night but the service, comfort and ease of in and out were perfect. The Room was clean and New.The breakfast was very good and surprising - there was waffel, biscuits and gravy and other things - a nice surprise. They actually had a person stationed in there and kept things very orderly and he was very friendly. Internet is so fast. I would stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “"" Great Place To Stay""”
Reviews.Author: 299kadams
Reviews.Content: We have stayed there before and both times were just for the night. It is a very nice hotel, rooms are clean. The staff are very helpful if you need anything.Internet speed is so fast. Break fast is good and fresh......

Reviews.Title: “Maybe 3-1/2.”
Reviews.Author: Jugandme
Reviews.Content: We booked this for our first night in Phoenix, coming from the airport, sight unseen. It was very decent, but we had a hard time finding it. Also, the neighborhood is what put us off somewhat. It is quite industrial, and we felt a little isolated, even though the freeway was very nearby. The motel itself was nice enough, and the staff was friendly and helpful. We needed a public computer, which they provided, so we were happy. The room was basic and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Staff and Management Super Friendly!”
Reviews.Author: Michelle S
Reviews.Content: We just wanted to say the staff we encountered from check in to check out was so polite and helpful, We witnessed what sounded like a customer that had one too many somethings and badgering the front desk staff. Management came out and remained calmed, desculated the obviously very loud and rude customer who was cussing and making a scene and then went right on taking care of everyone, If you want a comfortable, well priced, nice staffed place to stay this is it.

Reviews.Title: “excellent staff and property”
Reviews.Author: shirley s
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the comfort inn and was very delighted. My check in was very pleasant and the front desk shared all their amenities and also attractions in the city. The breakfast was Amazing and the Host Johnnie was great! I am bringing my family and they will love the comfortable beds and aviance of the Hotel. Thank you Comfort Inn! Shelly,

Reviews.Title: “THE RUDEST FRONT DESK PERSON!”
Reviews.Author: luv2trvls
Reviews.Content: I will never reccomend this hotel/motel to anyone!! Ever! Just call here and you can feel the rudeness...They just answer with "Comfort Inn". I can't imagine working in the Hosipitality Industry and being so rude....Ew! Seriously??? Stay far way from here if you like friendly service and a clean room! Atrocious!

Reviews.Title: “Relatively clean, very aged overall”
Reviews.Author: usuallyhappytravels
Reviews.Content: Checked in after midnight at this location, did not have an online reservation, but had checked prices an hour before and AAArate online was cheaper than the rate charged directly at hotel. (just 6$ 10% difference so not worth fighting, when I mentioned it at checkout in the morning). In any case, very affordable, lobby was in state of repair (carpet out, no furniture) but mostly presentable. Breakfast area OK, hardboiled eggs, juice, toast, limited cereal, apples, waffles. Bed nice, wall paper aged. bathroom with tiles, clean, although aged. Decent value for money but definitely have to reserve online to get any discount.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with good value”
Reviews.Author: Tecolate
Reviews.Content: A typical Comfort Inn....not fancy, but nice, well maintained rooms. The staff was particularly helpful...above average. Not much within walking distance, but there are good restaurants a short drive away. Access to I-10 is very easy.

Reviews.Title: “Close, well-run, good value but not brand new.”
Reviews.Author: profschiler
Reviews.Content: I stayed for four days while my friends stayed the center of downtown. I paid one quarter what they paid. We all went to the same conference and ate dinner together. I would get back in my car and drive five minutes through light surface traffic to get to my hotel. The service was pleasant, the light breakfast was normal (and you could make fresh waffles in the machine, if you were so inclined) and there was no stress. There was free internet in all rooms. Note: There was a pool, but I was there for business and had no time. Caution: It is located in a neighborhood of light industry and it would be a long walk to anywhere interesting. But it is to the west ot downtown and "inside" any possible traffic jam.

Reviews.Title: “Not so clean...”
Reviews.Author: travel1717
Reviews.Content: Hotel guestroom have new comforters, but guestroom curtains are filthy dirty with stains. The breakfast eating room chairs were stained and needed to be replaced. The breakfast itself was not "deluxe continental" breakfast as stated on their website. The hotel has a random odor.

Reviews.Title: “Large Cleaness Room”
Reviews.Author: Hoyacka
Reviews.Content: Jason and I stayed at Comfort Inn West We stayed 12/1/09 to 12/4/09 The front desk was Polite and Friendly The Rooms were Fresh The Breakfast was Nice The Next day Jason went to a Bingo tournament and he won $50,000 and a TV

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel experience in 30+ years of traveling.”
Reviews.Author: johnnyu01
Reviews.Content: Not sure where to begin, other than DO NOT EVER Stay here!!!! Room 212. Upon check into #212, there was a missing lightbulb on desk lamp, and the clock radio was not working. Called front desk and someone came up to replace the bulb & plug in the clock radio "behind" the bed. Saw some kind of small insect fly in front of the TV screen that night. Did not realize until the next morning when I went to shower, that there was NO shower curtain, once again had to call to have someone bring it up. No Wash cloths or Bath Floor mat, had to go down to front desk to get them. Noticed water dripping on the floor at/under the sink, leaky fixtures, reported and was finally fixed TWO (2) days later. The Tub/shower fixture was corroded & difficult to operate, the wallpaper was peeling & had Mold traces on it in several places. I made coffee each morning, and the Coffee maker was not cleaned the 2nd day, and it also broke. The little girl who was at the front desk was No help at all just told me I had to call the manager during the day. Unable to get any replacement. On Feb. 26th, there were TWO (2) Barking dogs (German Shepard & Chihuahua) in room 223 across the hall. The replacement towels were "worn" and frayed. The electronic keys did not work on 2/27 so I had to go back downstairs to get them reactivated. Then on 2/27 & 2/28, there was very little/ NO water pressure for the sink faucet. I left it on so "housekeeping" could see it & report it but it NEVER got fixed. I also bumped up against the wall by the sink and a Tile actually fell off the wall & onto the floor!!! When I got a "form" letter a week later stating they were "sorry" for what happened and they would credit me $85.00 (which was LESS than what I paid per night with tax). I called the property & tried speaking with the G.M., and he would have nothing to do with me and threatened to add the $85.00 back onto my card, he began yelling at me over the phone, so there was no way to have a civilized dialog or discussion. Tried calling Choice Corp. Guest Relations & not tooo much help there either as it has taken some time for someone that can actually DO SOMETHING to call me. VERY POOR Customer Service. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!STAY AWAY FROM THIS PROPERTY!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: taztraveler
Reviews.Content: Be prepared for some disappointments. First and foremost there is not any decent place to eat within five miles that I could find. Not even a fast food place. There is a mexican cafe near but I chose t avoid that. The room was all right except the carpet needed a cleaning also the bed cover have a burn hole in it. This was a non-smoking room. There was an ice machine on each of the three floors but not a one of them worked. English was spoken but with such accents it was very hard to understand what the staff was trying to communicate. A good cleaning and refurbishing along with someplace to get a meal this might be a good place to stay. Until that happens though I cannot recommend staying here. There are many other hotels about six miles down the road which look a lot better.

Reviews.Title: “Stay only if you need to for convenience sake”
Reviews.Author: gardengirl1964
Reviews.Content: We really trust TripAdvisor and when some of the reviews for this hotel were questionable we decided to stay anyway. We picked it because it was the highest rated hotel within our budget. I wish we had increased our budget. The non-smoking floor smelled like very stale cigarette smoke and our room smelled very bad. Basically it stunk! It took us until the morning to figure out what the smell was. The shower was backed up (for how long, who knows, probably quiet a while) and the smell was rotting water, almost a sewage smell from the standing water in the tub. We decided to not use the shower at all and left as early as we could to get out of that stinky room. Upon checkout (we stayed one night) we told the front desk about the room odor and they didn’t offer us any refund (we didn’t ask) but they did offer us a can of juice. They were basically very nice at the front desk and since the hotel did not look full, we probably could have changed rooms if we ask, but we didn’t ask – entirely our fault there. The location of the hotel was dismal. It was in an industrial part of town, all gray and brown. Though, it was literally right on Hwy 10, so it was really easy to get going to our next destination. The breakfast was the typical Fruitloops, Cherios fresh fruit, hard boiled eggs and a waffle making machine for fresh waffles. Would I stay there again? Only in desperation or if it was really late at night, I could get a room that didn’t smell and it was just a place to sleep for the night.

Reviews.Title: “Seedy”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: If you check in after 11:45PM you have to do it through a bank teller-like contraption while standing on the sidewalk....except the blinds of the window were down and I never actually saw a person on the inside. There's no speaker either, so the whole transaction was silent as well. Kind of like a David Lynch movie, including odd people coming and going in middle of the night. You just hope your car is still there the next morning.

Reviews.Title: “Beware this hotel and its practices”
Reviews.Author: sandy_grave
Reviews.Content: stayed at this hotel last yr. everything ws decent till we got home and they billed us $40 for a hotel blanket. there was nothing we or the corp could do. management basically called us thiefs. this was a bad way to treat customers and i probably wont fly into phoenix/but vegas to travel the sw. again. i have never been treated so rotton by a hotel or its management.

Reviews.Title: “microwave??”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Nice, clean room; comfortable beds. Plenty of hot water. Only complaint was we could not use the microwave in the breakfast area!! There was no one to help us and the microwave was behind a counter. Had a microwave in my room so I took my roll to my room to warm it!! Didn't make sense to me.

HotelInfo.Address: 1344 N 27th Ave, Phoenix, AZ 85009
